data.title: Dharmasala College
data.text:
About The College

Dharmasala college is an undergraduate provincialised Co-educational degree college affiliated under the prestigious Gauhati University, Assam providing three years undergraduate courses in Arts only and it was established in the year 1993 by eminent local philanthropists with the primary aim of providing quality higher education to the educationally, socially and economically background local community. The college had begun with only TDC classes temporarily within the premises of Youth Club cum Library, Dharmasala and the Subject Teachers of the nearest Hadurhat Dharmasala H.S. School were engaged as the Guest Lecturers and the Honâ€™ble Shri Amal Kanti Sen, a Retd. Lecturer of B. N. College, Dhubri was the first Principal of our College. After a couple of years the College was shifted to its own existing campus and recruited permanent faculty and office staff.

The college aims to promote as well as impart the quality education irrespective of caste, gender and so on with minimum cost. The motto of the college is to create human resources through the excellence of knowledge and wisdom amongst the youth of the rural areas. Since its inception a large number of students have been able to get suitable employment and quality good numbers of students have found profitable self employment. Many of the students done well and well placed in different walks of life. The college aims to empower girl students by providing the opportunities of higher education to make them employable and financially and socially self reliant. In view of that, the College has been offering ODL in UG and PG courses under KKSHOU, Assam.
